members.name: Joey Rubas
members.bio: Joey is the chair and founder of the APDA tech committee

members.name: Raina Batra
members.bio: Raina is a member at large on the APDA board, and serves as the liason between the tech committee and APDA board. She is currently a junior at Amherst College in Massachusetts.

members.name: Ian McVann
members.bio: Ian has been one of Tech Committees most active members since 2024..
